pageContent: © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Presented by Debbie Parrish, EX Product Manager   –   Enrollment Management  with special guest, Rob Powell, EX Product Manager   -   Student  Jenzabar  June 1, 2016  #1591   –   Test Score Updates © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Lots of new stuff     Test Category     Active, Begin/End Dates     PESC EDI/XML codes     CTE Assessment     Pre/Post Test Eligible     Standard Test Definition © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     State Reporting Requirements     Advising     Electronic Transcripts     New Test Score formats  Why do we need lots of new stuff? © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  EX Release   Enhancement  EX 6.0   •   Test Category   –   To identify test as Admissions vs. Placement  EX 6.0.1  (5.5.2)  •   PESC Controlled Release   -   To import test scores included on electronic transcripts (EDI)  •   PESC XML and EDI code mapping to Test and Test Element codes  •   PESC XML and EDI Test and Subtest Definition  EX 6.1   •   Begin and End Dates   –   To select the correct test code used for different versions of a test  •   Ability to Edit Test Scores in Review Internet Submission for Transcript (580) submission types  •   PESC General Release of EDI electronic transcripts, including test scores  EX 6.2.1   •   Pre and Post Test Support   -   To link designated tests to courses and track pre/post test qualification  •   CTE Assessment Support   -   To designate tests as an   assessment for a Career and Technical Education  (CTE) program and track tests passed  EX 6.3   •   Standard   Test Definition   –   To define standard tests and designate Test and Test Element Codes as  standard  •   Entrance/Placement Test Lookup   –   To define which tests meet placement status levels for specific  subject areas  •   Ability to link courses to pre/post tests  •   Ability to review Test Codes from Student Page in   EXi  Enhancement Timeline © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  EX Release   Enhancement  EX 6.3.1   •   Support   new 2016 SAT  •   Transfer to PowerFAIDS  •   Recalculate Highest Test Scores default query update  EX 6.4   •   Test Results Received Date  Future   •   Import   SAT and ACT Test Scores  Enhancement Timeline © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  New 2016 SAT Test Scores  Test Definition  Test Code   Description  SAT16   SAT Test 2016  Test Element Definition  Test Element   Description  EBRW   EB Reading and Writing  MATH   Math  Each school   needs   to create new Test Codes and Elements to accommodate each new  test.   We recommend that schools create at least the following (or similar) codes to  hold the SAT Total and two Section scores that are summed to yield the total. © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  The following is a list of the areas   for   each school   to   evaluate and update as needed.     Test Definition     Admissions Import Utility     Requirement Definition     Existing Form Builder Forms in JICS     Data Export to PowerFAIDS     Custom and Ad Hoc Reports  New 2016 SAT Test Prep © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Test Definition     Current look © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Used by   EXi   Advising     Categories   include:  •   Other  •   Undergraduate Admissions  •   Undergraduate Placement  •   Graduate Admissions  •   Graduate   Placement     Assigned to Test Codes only, not Test  Elements     In EX 6.3,   Standard Test   Definition  allows Test Category to be assigned  Test Category (6.0) © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Active, Begin/End Dates (6.1)  Begin Date   Test only   Indicates when test started to be used.   This can indicate the life  span of tests that have changed   over time like   ACT and SAT.  End Date   Test only   Indicates when the test usage ended. This can indicate the life  span of tests that have changed   over time like   ACT and SAT or  tests that are no longer   available.  Active?   Test &  Test  Element  Indicates if this test is Active.   You   can use   this to indicate that  you are still accepting scores from tests   where the   End Date has  passed.  Inactive codes   drop   to the bottom of any data drop - down to  minimize selecting tests that are no longer active .  Standard   Test Definition includes Active flag. © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort     Test and Test Element Definition     Used by import of test scores via Electronic Transcript  •   EDI format currently supported  •   XML format support coming     Define the codes you need  •   PESC Test EDI Definition  •   PESC Test XML Definition  •   PESC Subtest EDI Definition  •   PESC Subtest XML Definition     Standard Test Definition allows PESC codes be set  PESC EDI/XML codes (6.0.1/5.5.2, 6.1) © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  CTE Assessment (6.2.1)     Career   and Technical Education (CTE) programs     Tests for   certification, licensure, proficiency or other workforce related  reasons © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  CTE Assessment Passed (6.2.1)     Indicate student passed test     Checkbox available only if test defined as CTE Assessment     Future (EX 6.4): Adding Test Results Received Date © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Pre/Post Test Eligible (6.2.1)     Define   a   test for usage as a pre - test   and/or a post - test  •   A pre - test indicates how a student qualified to take a course  •   A post - test evaluates the student’s success after completing the course     Allows test to be linked to student’s course  •   The student’s course can be linked to a test in 6.3     Required   for Arkansas State Reporting © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Designate Pre/Post Test to Course     From Test Scores, select View \ Link [Pre -   or] Post - test Courses     Or From Edit Test Scores, if the test is a subtest. © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Designate Pre/Post Test to Course     Student Course Lookup opens, filter   by year and term, if you   wish     Select   the course and click   Select [Pre -   or] Post - test   Course     Ability to link pre/post test directly from the course (6.3) © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Designate Pre/Post Test to Course     Once you save the course you linked to the test, the Used as Pre -   or  Post - test shows as checked © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Designate Pre/Post Test to Course     Student   Course Details   window |   Academic   tab     Student   Registration   window | S tudent Course Details   tab  The   Related Tests   group box  shows the pre -   or post - test  linked to the   course © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Designate Pre/Post Test to Course     Courses   window |   Class List   tab  •   For   any student with a test linked, the test is listed in the   Placement/Pre - Test  or   Evaluative/Post - Test   column © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Standard Test Definition (6.3) © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Standard Test Definition     Provides for EX and School defined standard tests     Map to existing Test and Test Element codes     Min and Max Ranges  •   Will alert user when score is outside range, but range is not enforced     Use to identify specific scores for specific functions  •   AR State Reporting  •   Create Student Update transfer of new SAT 2016 scores (6.3.1) © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Test Scores     Current Look     With permissions, access to Select Entrance and Placement Tests © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Entrance/Placement Test Lookup © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Select Entrance/Placement Tests (6.3)     Definitive method to select the following Test Types for students  •   Entrance  •   English  •   Reading  •   Math  •   Science © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Create Student Update (6.3.1 July 2016)     Original SAT test scores will no longer be transferred     2005 SAT test scores will transfer based on mapping to standard test type     2016 SAT test scores will transfer based on mapping to standard test type     Highest Test Score option will transfer the *BEST 2016 SAT Total score © 2016 Jenzabar, Inc.   June 1   -   4, 2016 Gaylord Texan Resort  Thank you!  Please   take time to fill out the   survey for session 1591 - Test Scores Update:  https :// www.jenzabarevents.com/jam/post_conference_eval.cfm  Evaluation
